ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We are very grateful to the informants for sharing their knowledge with us. We are also very glad to say “Jay-suu-tin-ba-de (Thank you very much)” to all of the Myanmar people who helped us in the fieldwork. We thank Prof. Pei Shengji, Prof. Thaung Naing Oo, Prof. Aung Zaw Moe and Dr. Yazar Minn for technical guidance and support; the experts of the University of Traditional Myanmar Medicine in Mandalay for reference books; and Ms. Zhang Dong-dong, Ms. Yang Jun and Dr. Cai Jie for fieldwork cooperation. We also thank Nyi Nyi Lwin for his warm and thoughtful arrangement of field trips in Myanmar.
